roleset.name: create, come about
roleset.note: ORIGINATE-V NOTES: Arg3 would be a benefactive (based on 'create'), but I doubt that willappear. (from originate.01-v)
ORIGIN-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to originate.01. VN class establish-55.5-1. FN class origin. Framed by Katie. (from origin.01-n)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Initially, the company said it-1 will close its commercial real-estate lending division, and stop *trace*-1 originating new leases at its commercial lease subsidiary.

example.name: ARG3
example.text: It originated as a pure-line selection from a mixed variety called Canada Cluster.
example.arg: as a pure-line selection from a mixed variety called Canada Cluster.

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: The wax apple is a tropical fruit originating from the Malay peninsula .

example.name: arg 1
example.text: the origin of the woman 's injuries

example.name: arg 2 is not simply the location where something began, but what it was created from (so 'insurance market' was not created from 'a coffee house')
example.text: the insurance market 's origins in a coffeehouse in 17th century London
